title: Dirthouse

My dirthouse

Mind wanders

My dirthouse

Look into my eye

Cut through me
Living in the dirt
These dogs are curled up in a little ball
These dogs are freezing their asses off

Go, go, go
Pick up the pieces
I wanna call this my home

I've got some pain of my own
